sourcesContent:
import * as yup from "yup";

export const orderFormValidation = yup.object().shape({
  zipFrom: yup
    .string()
    .min(3, "Too Short!")
    .max(5, "Too Long!")
    .required("Required"),
  zipTo: yup
    .string()
    .min(3, "Too Short!")
    .max(5, "Too Long!")
    .required("Required"),
  pickUpDate: yup.date().nullable(),
  dropOffDate: yup.date().nullable(),
  numberOfCars: yup.string().ensure().required("Required!"),
  vehicleMake: yup.string().ensure().required("Required!"),
  vehicleModel: yup.string().ensure().required("Required!"),
  vehicleYear: yup.string().ensure().required("Required!"),
  mileage: yup.number().required().positive().integer(),
  vinNumber: yup.number().required().positive().integer(),
  isItOperable: "",
  isItInAuction: "",
});
